attributes.action: Amend The Estate Agents (Undesirable Practices) (No. 2) Order 1991
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To prevent estate agents from charging their clients commission where they have not introduced the buyer in any circumstances.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Amend The Estate Agents (Undesirable Practices) (No. 2) Order 1991."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15382.asp

Prime Minister's Office
